headline: Progressive Reports November 2025 Results
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended November 30, 2025: November(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited) 2025 2024 ChangeNet premiums written$6,193 $5,563 11 %Net premiums earned$6,894 $6,040 14 %Net income$958 $1,006 (5)%Per share available to common shareholders$1.63 $1.71 (5)%Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$32 $175 (82)%Combined ratio 87

content.title: Progressive Reports November 2025 Results
content.summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended November 30, 2025: November(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited) 2025 2024 ChangeNet premiums written$6,193 $5,563 11 %Net premiums earned$6,894 $6,040 14 %Net income$958 $1,006 (5)%Per share available to common shareholders$1.63 $1.71 (5)%Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$32 $175 (82)%Combined ratio 87
